name: ALT_BPA_TRGR_GNMED
description: This table contains the BestPractice Advisory trigger of include generic medication.

columns.name: ALERT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the alert record for this row.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: This is a numeric representation of the date of this encounter in your system. The integer portion of the number specifies the date of the encounter. The digits after the decimal point indicate multiple visits on one day.

columns.name: BPA_GENERIC_MED_C_NAME
columns.description: This column stores the advisory triggers related to generic medications.
